movies.title: Ritual of Death
movies.plot: When a local acting company decides to stage an updated version of an Egyptian ritual involving human sacrifice, they unleash a dark and evil force. A vengeful satanic priestess uses the acting troupe to summon the spirit of a fanatical cult leader.
movies.simplePlot: When a local acting company decides to stage an updated version of an Egyptian ritual involving human sacrifice, they unleash a dark and evil force. A vengeful satanic priestess uses the ...

biography.bio: Olair Coan was born on January 7, 1958 in Porto Feliz, São Paulo, Brazil as Olair José Coan. He was an actor, known for Ritual of Death (1990), Satanic Attraction (1989) and Desmundo (2002). He died on December 29, 2007 in Highway Castello Branco, São Paulo.
biography.name: Olair Coan

biography.bio: Karina Palatnik is an actress, known for Ritual of Death (1990), Eu (1987) and Fofão - A Nave Sem Rumo (1988).
biography.name: Karina Palatnik

biography.bio: Tião Hoover is an actor, known for Ritual of Death (1990) and O Círculo do Prazer (1983).
biography.name: Tião Hoover

biography.bio: Serafim Gonzalez was born on May 19, 1934 in Sertãozinho, São Paulo, Brazil. He was an actor, known for Women in Love (2003), Belíssima (2005) and A Prisão (1980). He was married to Mara Husemann. He died on April 29, 2007 in Santos, São Paulo.
biography.name: Serafim Gonzalez

biography.bio: Michael Kelly is an actor, known for Ritual of Death (1990), Starman (1986) and Throb (1986).
biography.name: Michael Kelly

biography.bio: Sérgio Hingst was born in 1924 in Sorocaba, São Paulo, Brazil. He was an actor and assistant director, known for Sous le soleil de Bahia (1956), Hallelujah Gretchen (1976) and The Prophet of Hunger (1970). He died on November 8, 2004 in Sorocaba.
biography.name: Sérgio Hingst

biography.bio: Lilian Ramos was born on February 27, 1964 in Fortaleza, Ceará, Brazil. She is an actress, known for A Rota do Brilho (1990), Ritual of Death (1990) and Na Cama Com... (1993).
biography.name: Lilian Ramos

biography.bio: Graça Costa is an actress, known for Ritual of Death (1990).
biography.name: Graça Costa

biography.bio: Léo Robinson is an actor, known for Ritual of Death (1990).
biography.name: Léo Robinson

biography.bio: Mara Husemann was born as Mara Antônia Hüsemann Gonzalez. She is an actress, known for O Prisioneiro do Sexo (1978), Ritual of Death (1990) and Amor Estranho Amor (1982). She was previously married to Serafim Gonzalez.
biography.name: Mara Husemann

biography.bio: Ana Flora is an actress, known for Ritual of Death (1990).
biography.name: Ana Flora

biography.bio: Vanessa Alves was born on September 4, 1963 in São Paulo, São Paulo, Brazil. She is an actress, known for Garotas do ABC (2003), Anjos do Arrabalde (1987) and Extremos do Prazer (1984).
biography.name: Vanessa Alves

biography.bio: Eduardo Panizza is an actor, known for Ritual of Death (1990).
biography.name: Eduardo Panizza

biography.bio: Leticia Vota is an actress, known for The Call of the Oboe (1998), Ritual of Death (1990) and Las aventuras de Los Parchís (1982).
biography.name: Leticia Vota

biography.bio: Alfredo Gonzalez is an actor, known for Ritual of Death (1990).
biography.name: Alfredo Gonzalez
